alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 07 at 2:07PM CST until February 09 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Glover River At Glover affecting McCurtain County. For the Glover River...including Glover...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Glover River At Glover. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, The Glover River is at flood stage with minor flooding at its confluence with the Little River west of Golden, Oklahoma. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 4.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon because of forecast rainfall expected to fall tonight through Wednesday. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 900 AM CST.
